H0.text: Since the foundation of the Football League which is the only team from outside the League (or Premier League) to win the FA Cup, doing so in 1901. Tottenham Hotspur

H1.text: Since the foundation of the Football League which is the only team from outside the League (or Premier League) to win the FA Cup, doing so in 1901. Sheffield Wednesday

H2.text: Since the foundation of the Football League which is the only team from outside the League (or Premier League) to win the FA Cup, doing so in 1901. Nottingham Forest

H3.text: Since the foundation of the Football League which is the only team from outside the League (or Premier League) to win the FA Cup, doing so in 1901. COYS

A4.text: After its inception, Tottenham won the FA Cup for the first time in 1901, the only non-League club to do so since the formation of the Football League in 1888.

A5.text: The following year Spurs won the 1901 FA Cup by beating Sheffield United 3–1 in a replay of the final, after the first game ended in a 2–2 draw.
